wikipedia_page.main: Elaine M. Goodwin is a British artist and author.  She has exhibited extensively, written several works on art and design, and was founder president of the British Association of Modern Mosaics (BAMM).  Together with other prominent artists, Goodwin also co-founded Tessellated Expression for the 21st Century (TE-21), a group of professional artists dedicated to exhibitions of the tessellated art form.
